description: Styles for the Tic Tac Toe web game, defining colors, layout, and responsiveness.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container styles for the application, centers its content.

classes.name: game-title
classes.description: Styles for the game title text.

classes.name: game-info
classes.description: Styles for informational text about the game.

classes.name: game-board
classes.description: Grid layout for the game board.

classes.name: board-cell
classes.description: Styles for individual cells on the game board.

classes.name: reset-button
classes.description: Styles for the reset button used to restart the game.
